message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $17,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget concerns, but I'm confident in the value this product brings. How about we settle at $18,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $17,500. Can we meet at this price?
